Description:
Detect use of Get-GPO to get one GPO or all the GPOs in a domain.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious GPO Discovery With Get-GPO
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where scriptblocktext like '%get-gpo%'
